title: Is technology bad or good? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: It isn't completely a bad thing, but it isn't necessarily a good thing either. So here's the good, bad and the ugly of technology and what it says about us. Good: Without a doubt, technology is definitely good for us in numerous ways

Every boon can be a curse if used wrongly. Technology is a boon. It can be used for the betterment of the mankind but it can be used to destroy it as well. It all depends on how we use technology as a curse or as a boon.
